title: Photos: Army arrest Boko Haram kingpin, rescue more women
content: Press statement from the Nigerian ArmyPlease recall that yesterday advancing troops along Banki axis were making tremendous progress in which they cleared 2 Boko Haram terrorists camps at Jangurori and Bulatori villages. In addition to that, the troops have also arrested 43 suspected Boko Haram terrorists including one of the Boko Haram kingpins in the area, Bulama Modu who is an ‘Amir’ of Bulakuri. The troops also rescued 241 women & children during the operation.To further confirm what was said earlier about the terrorists abandoning their commanders and burying weapons,...
